subproject.description: This umbrella project for Management and Operational Support to Kosovo Institutions is designed to provide a framework for facilitation of provision of expertise and assistance of management and operational nature (as opposed to capacity development) to the institutions in Kosovo. The provision of the assistance will be carried through the deployment of the international expert assignments on demand driven basis as requested by the Kosovo institutions, while the responsibility for monitoring the progress and outcomes of each assignment will rest with the receiving party i.e. respective Government institutions.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Mngm&Ops supp.to KOS.Inst-Int’

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
